name: River of Shadows - Interactive Visuals
description:
Interactive Visual for the book River of Shadows.

Created using Unity3D
Made for Tech and Nature class

Assets used

Nature -https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/nature-package-forest-enviro...
Horses -https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/horse-animset-pro-ri...
Icon Representation - https://www.dkfindout.com/us/animals-and-nature/horses/what-is-horse/

Rest of the models and environments created by Alexander Xie
